price: 95. Wuxuu yidhi: Wuxuu awood I siiyey Rabbigay baa igu filan oo khayr roon, ee igu caawiya xoog (shaqaale) waxaan yeeli moos xir weyn dhexdiinna idinka iyo iyaga.
arabic: قَالَ مَا مَكَّنِّي فِيهِ رَبِّي خَيۡرٞ فَأَعِينُونِي بِقُوَّةٍ أَجۡعَلۡ بَيۡنَكُمۡ وَبَيۡنَهُمۡ رَدۡمًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla mā makkannī fīhi rabbī khayrun fa-aʿīnūnī biquwwatin ajʿal baynakum wabaynahum radman
